sentence: When arrived at the room I found that it was not possible to see any ocean at all from inside the room
The issues at hand were One Definition of a partial ocean view
The room was completely forgettable minus the ocean view from this particular room 3503
I had booked an oceanfront room for our week long stay
Room numbers consist of 4 digits
Also there was visible BLACK MOLD growing on the wallpaper above the mirror in the bathroom
One day I called and requested that our room be cleaned between 10 am and 3 pm we got back at 3 pm and it was not done
They could not move us until the next night and assured us it was a full ocean view
I mean every night we were in room 315 not sure if it is by a janitors closet or something

There was an issue with the toilet getting plugged up and overflowed upon checking into room but it was taken care of immediately toilet issue fixed and bathroom was cleaned up while we went to the pool
Wonderful relaxing place to stay with comfortable rooms and acomodating staff
The hotel room seemed like it was freshly remodeled and very clean and comfortable
The staff were very attentive easy check in process they upgraded our room and gave us early check in and all of the facilities were amazing
Great staff and beautiful views of Huntington Beach and it help that its Oceanfront
This is a great hotel location excellent rooms nice pool comfortable
The Catalina Suite was large and beautifully put together with two balconies
The check in was very efficient and I was able to get into my room right away
The facility is always perfect the rooms comfy and quiet the exercise room has plenty of machines and other gear and the ocean is just across the street
The hotel and rooms are very nice
We enjoyed the family style BQ on the lawn with live bands and then watched the fireworks off of HB pier from the comfort of our ocean view suite
